review.title: nice hotel close to Centrial station
review.reviewText: in euorpe very difficult to judge a hotel from outside . when we saw the gate of hotel it looks just a doorway but enter inside ...newly constructed nice place to stay .   Rooms very big and breakfast nice . staff very coperative and place near to central railway station of Milan .
review.negativeRemarks: there should be more flor mats in rooms coz  due to tiles and weather ...floor is more cold.

review.title: Clean and comfortable hotel
review.reviewText: We found Hotel San Francisco was fine for a short stay. Its close to a metro station and within a long walk to all the action.

review.title: I stayed for one night
review.reviewText:
It was a brief overnight stay before a morning flight returning to the US.
I was hoping for a single room, but they said they were booked (strangely I never saw any other people)
The room was delightful, and cool.  Breakfast was delish, and their recommendation for a good local restaurant excellent.
review.positiveRemarks: It is walkable from the Stazione Centrale.  It is in a quiet neighborhood.  Very friendly staff.
review.negativeRemarks: small refridge would be a plus.
review.locationRemarks: walkable to central station,  grocery store a few blocks away, quiet neighborhood, shops and restaurants nearby.

review.title: Just Right
review.reviewText:
We loved our stay! Good location with lovely street front. 

Every employee was nice and accommodating. 

Rooms were so big and spacious! Bathroom was very nice and had great lighting. Everything so clean!

Breakfast was quite enjoyable. I liked being able to order a cappuccino or Americano while I prepared a plate. 

My favorite hotel from my two week visit to Italy.
